languages.text: "Ты пош{mf|ел|ла} наперекор чужой участи, чтобы украсть ее. Ты принял{mf||а} зов Истины Изначальной — чтобы завладеть иной судьбой. Да будет так. Я сплел нити судьбы и {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}протянул тебе руку{/d}, когда пламя воздвиглось на твоем пути. Ты принял{mf||а} ее и тем самым запечатал{mf||а} свою судьбу. В будущем... в будущем ты сполна отплатишь мне за эту милость".

"Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}held out my hand to you{/d} when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in doing so, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."
languages.original_text: "Ты пош{mf|ел|ла} наперекор чужой участи, чтобы украсть ее. Ты принял{mf||а} зов Истины Изначальной — чтобы завладеть иной судьбой. Да будет так. Я сплел нити судьбы и {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}протянул тебе руку{/d}, когда пламя воздвиглось на твоем пути. Ты принял{mf||а} ее и тем самым запечатал{mf||а} свою судьбу. В будущем... в будущем ты сполна отплатишь мне за эту милость".

traits.locale_text: "Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and held out my hand to you when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in so doing, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."
"Did you cross another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it."

"Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and held out my hand to you when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in so doing, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."
"Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it."
"Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it."

"Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and held out my hand to you when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in so doing, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."

languages.text: “你阻拦在别人的命运之路上，只是为了盗走本属于别人的命运吗？你已经接受了原初真理的召唤，声称这是你自己的命运。既然如此，就这样吧。我编织了命运的丝线，当火焰在你的道路上升起时，我向你{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}伸出了手{/d}。你接受了我的礼物，也决定了你的命运。而将来……将来，你要充分报答我赐予你的祝福。”
languages.original_text: "Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}held out my hand to you{/d} when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in doing so, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."

traits.locale_text: “你阻拦在别人的命运之路上，只是为了盗走本属于别人的命运吗？你已经接受了原初真理的召唤，声称这是你自己的命运。既然如此，就这样吧。”
“你阻拦在别人的命运之路上，只是为了盗走本属于别人的命运吗？你已经接受了原初真理的召唤，声称这是你自己的命运。既然如此，就这样吧。我编织了命运的丝线，当火焰在你的道路上升起时，我向你{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}伸出了手{/d}。你接受了我的礼物，也决定了你的命运。而将来……将来，你要充分报答我赐予你的祝福。”

languages.text: «¿Te has interpuesto en el destino de otro solo para robárselo? Has aceptado la llamada de la Verdad Primordial y te has apropiado de ese destino. Que así sea. He tejido un destino y {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}te he ofrecido mi mano{/d} cuando las llamas se han interpuesto en tu camino. La has tomado, sellando tu destino al hacerlo. En el futuro... En un futuro, me compensarás por este don que te he dado».
languages.original_text: "Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}held out my hand to you{/d} when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in doing so, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."

traits.locale_text: «¿Te has interpuesto en el destino de otro solo para robarlo? Has aceptado la llamada de la Verdad Primordial... y has reclamado ese destino como tuyo. Que así sea».

languages.text: 「お前は他者の運命を奪うために、その道に立ちはだかったというのか？お前は原初の真実の呼びかけを受け入れ、その運命を自分のものだと主張した。よかろう。私は運命の糸を紡ぎ、お前の行く手に炎が生じたとき、{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}手を差し伸べた{/d}。その手を取ったお前は、そうすることで自らの運命を決した。この先…未来において、お前はこの恩寵に報いることになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}held out my hand to you{/d} when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in doing so, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が他人の運命の道に立ちはだかったのは、それを盗むためだけなのか？お前は原初の真実の呼び出しに応じて、その運命が自分のものだと主張した。それならばそうすればいい」

「お前は他者の運命を奪うために、その道に立ちはだかったというのか？お前は原初の真実の呼びかけを受け入れ、その運命を自分のものだと主張した。よかろう。私は運命の糸を紡ぎ、お前の行く手に炎が生じたとき、{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}手を差し伸べた{/d}。その手を取ったお前は、そうすることで自らの運命を決した。この先…未来において、お前はこの恩寵に報いることになるだろう」

languages.text: « Avez-vous entravé le chemin de la destinée d'un autre pour la lui dérober ? Vous avez accepté l'appel de la Vérité Primordiale et vous êtes approprié ce sort comme s'il était le vôtre. Qu'il en soit ainsi. J'ai tissé les fils du destin et {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}vous ai tendu la main{/d} lorsque la flamme s'est manifestée sur votre chemin. Vous l'avez saisie, et ce faisant, vous avez scellé votre sort. À l'avenir... à l'avenir, vous me revaudrez pleinement cette faveur. »
languages.original_text: "Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}held out my hand to you{/d} when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in doing so, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous entravé le chemin de la destinée d'un autre pour la lui dérober ? Vous avez accepté l'appel de la Vérité Primordiale et vous êtes approprié ce sort comme s'il était le vôtre. Qu'il en soit ainsi. »

languages.text: "Habt Ihr Euch dem Los einer anderen Person in den Weg gestellt, nur um es zu stehlen? Ihr habt den Ruf der Primordialen Wahrheit angenommen – und dieses Schicksal als Euer eigenes angenommen. So sei es. Ich habe die Fäden des Schicksals gesponnen und {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}Euch meine Hand gereicht{/d}, als die Flamme auf Eurem Weg aufloderte. Ihr habt sie angenommen und damit Euer Schicksal besiegelt. In der Zukunft ... in der Zukunft werdet Ihr mir diesen Segen vergelten."
languages.original_text: "Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}held out my hand to you{/d} when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in doing so, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr Euch dem Los einer anderen Person in den Weg gestellt, nur um es zu stehlen? Ihr habt den Ruf der Primordialen Wahrheit angenommen – und dieses Schicksal als Euer eigenes angenommen. So sei es."

languages.text: "Bir başkasının kaderine onu çalmak için mi mâni oldun? Sen Ezelî Hakikat'in çağrısını kabul ettin ve bu kaderi kendi alın yazın olarak benimsedin. O hâlde öyle olsun. Kaderin ipliklerini ben ördüm ve alevler yolunu tıkadığında {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}sana elimi uzattım{/d}. Sen de o eli tutarak kaderini mühürledin. İleride... İleride bu iyiliğin karşılığını bana tamı tamına ödeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "Did you stand in the path of another's destiny only to steal it? You accepted the call of the Primordial Truth — and claimed that fate as your own. So be it. I wove the threads of destiny and {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}held out my hand to you{/d} when the flame arose in your path. You took it and, in doing so, sealed your fate. In the future... in the future, you will repay me for this boon in full."
